## array() function

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function array<T = string>(
  nodes: ReadonlyArray<T>,
  edges: ReadonlyArray<[T, T | undefined]>
): any[];
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type                                       | Description     |
| --------- | ------------------------------------------ | --------------- |
| nodes     | ReadonlyArray&lt;T&gt;                     | the nodes array |
| edges     | ReadonlyArray&lt;\[T, T \| undefined\]&gt; | the edges array |

<b>Returns:</b>

any\[\]

the topologically sorted node array
